TopicTitle: EVA-11 fuel canister does not give extra fuel

Articles.Content: With or without the EVA-11 being equipped, the Kerbal only has 5 units of EVA propellant. It would seem to me that equipping the EVA-11 would give an extra ten units. Anyone else run into this? I have a screen shot available here. https://www.dropbox.com/s/kbfun34qf5bywdg/screenshot86.jpg?dl=0
You've put it in the wrong place- that's the KIS inventory, not the stock one. Stock inventory parts only work in the stock inventory.
